languages.text: For every kill, the wearer increases their critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} by +5% until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Each kill committed by the wielder increases critical hit chance by +5% (maximum +30%) until the end of combat.

languages.text: Für jeden Kill erhöht der Träger seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +5 %.

languages.text: Chaque élimination confère à l'utilisateur +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup{/g} critique supplémentaires jusqu'à la fin du combat.
